name: Candy Catch (TwitchyOrphan)
description:
A game created by following a tutorial by Raja with Charger Games! I personally added the music, sound effects, and additional features such as the ability to regain life by catching hearts as well as adding a level of difficulty by increasing the candy spawn rate as you cross certain score thresholds. Thank you for playing! 

Updated 11/2/22 - Added toggle to allow player to use their mouse to control the monster. Also increased the candy spawn rate when using the mouse to offset the decrease in difficulty.

Credits:

Raja with Charger Games! (https://www.udemy.com/user/rajabiswas/)

Dark Fantasy Studio - La Voie Divine (Background Music)

Clean Wet Gulps - Wizage (https://freesound.org/people/Wizage/sounds/418853/)

Heartbeat - Bpianoholic (https://freesound.org/people/Bpianoholic/sounds/493132/)
